infos.desc:
Hello there!
More than 5 years experience as Front-end developer: websites, responsiveness and mobile application. Intermedium English.

I am very active, I like to meet new people, talk, exchange experiences and mainly be always studying and learning new technologies and improving myself personally and professionally.
